banner.heading: Financial Modelling & Valuation Mentorship
banner.text: (3 Months Mentorship with Live & Recorded Sessions)

syllabus.title: Week 1 -Finding Right Industry
syllabus.subtitle: We learn to find suitable industries and let our clients invest.

syllabus.title: Week 2 - Finding Right Stock
syllabus.subtitle: We learn to find the perfect company that has the potential to be bigger.

syllabus.title: Week 3 - Financial Modelling: Foundation
syllabus.subtitle: Know the essentials to make financial models like A/cing Principles, statement items & more.

syllabus.title: Week 4 - MS Excel For Models
syllabus.subtitle: Understanding Excel functions, which the industry uses to make financial models.
syllabus.alt: How to check Cash Flow Statement

syllabus.title: Week 5 - Making Financial Models
syllabus.subtitle: The action begins. You start to put items together to create financial models.

syllabus.title: Week6 - Estimation Approaches
syllabus.subtitle: Top down & Bottom up (industry favourites) are the two most common approaches you will apply.

syllabus.title: Week 7 - Sensitivity Analysis
syllabus.subtitle: This is where you test your model and check it for input variations.

syllabus.title: Week 8 - Making Advanced Models
syllabus.subtitle: Learn how M&A managers work around the models.
syllabus.alt: Buying Gold at The Price of Silver

syllabus.title: Week 9 - Understanding DCF Inputs
syllabus.subtitle: There are three major inputs in DCF, and we will dissect each.
syllabus.alt: Valuation Hacks to Find Undervalued Gems

syllabus.title: Week 10 - Calculating DCF Inputs
syllabus.subtitle: Discount rates, cashflows & growth are the inputs that require your attention the most.

syllabus.title: Week 11 - Finding Fair Value
syllabus.subtitle: This section will tell you if you want to buy a company at this price of not.

syllabus.title: Week 12 - Other Valuation Models & Farewell
syllabus.subtitle: Learning relative valuation models, where we compare a company with others.

user_testimonials.name: Mustafa Mirza
user_testimonials.comment: मैं एक PSI हूँ, मैने पर जो भी सिखा हू उसका श्रेय प्रसाद सर को जाता है, और मैने उनका कोर्स देखा है! और इस कोर्स से मै जो चिजे सिखा हू शायदही वह मुझे कही और सिखने मिलती!

user_testimonials.name: Ganesh vhatkar
user_testimonials.comment: It was very informative and more than value for money. Yet few more sector analysis are needed

user_testimonials.name: Kamal Kishore Tiwadih
user_testimonials.comment: I started investing ₹5,000 in shares with the help of the course. Today, I've invested ₹40,000, and my portfolio total amount is ₹84,000. This is due to Prasad sir's Course.

user_testimonials.name: Gaurav Kashyap
user_testimonials.comment: I have followed Prasad Sir since 2020. When I learned about his course, I was the fastest mover to enroll in the course. I got all answers to my queries.

user_testimonials.name: Ganesh vhatkar
user_testimonials.comment: It was very informative and more than value for money. Yet few more sector analysis are needed

candidate.courseTxt: Those who want to start their investment journey independently

faq.question: Will the Class be on the Weekend?
faq.answer: Yes, classes will be on every weekend for 12 weeks. You need to give Friday & Sunday for classes.

faq.question: Is it live or recorded?
faq.answer: We have divided this course into 25% theory and 75% practical, so the theory classes are recorded, and the practicals and Q&A are live.

faq.question: Do we get access to industry experts?
Will I get a certificate for FMVM?
Are there any eligibility criteria?
faq.answer: You need to have a basic understanding of the share market.

clientTestimonial.name: Monish garach
clientTestimonial.text: I've been following Prasad on YT and have been part of his club. I'm impressed with his knowledge and manner of communication.

clientTestimonial.name: Ravinder Singh
clientTestimonial.text: I took the beginner and fundamental analysis course and advanced my understanding of the market. Prasad sir helped me become financially literate.

clientTestimonial.name: Harsh Kashyap
clientTestimonial.text: Hi Prasad Sir, I completed the course, and thank you for the bonus on best MUTUAL FUNDS. I learned many new things that helped me correct my mistake of picking.

clientTestimonial.name: Darshan jadhav
clientTestimonial.text: wonderful explanation.... you are really great mentor. ur videos are very easy to understand. Salute your vision to make new generation financially literate. Thank u😊

clientTestimonial.name: Nehal dalvi
clientTestimonial.text: I had an amazing experience with this course because it is very well explained. The best part of this course is its recorded so that we can listen again.

clientTestimonial.name: Harish Kuyate
clientTestimonial.text: I recently purchased Prasad sir's course on the Market and I learned a lot. I would highly recommend this course who are new in market.

clientTestimonial.name: Ankit Singh Hooda
clientTestimonial.text: I bought this course and found it extremely valuable. Every business personality and share market lover should buy this course. my friends also loved it.
